Title: Pattern Soup

----

Text: Ultralab Apps has collaborated with l’Atelier Irradié and 2 artists to create sixteen patterns and original wallpapers to launch their new Pattern Soup mobile app.

----

Date: 

----

Client: Ultra Lab

----

Projecttype: Artwork

----

Text2: It’s an iOS app which creates original collages with the pictures on your smartphone.

----

Year: 2015
